abstract: Unlike Goldman Sachs executives, who are forgoing cash bonuses but accepting stock, John J. Mack will get no year-end bonus at all.
snippet: Unlike Goldman Sachs executives, who are forgoing cash bonuses but accepting stock, John J. Mack will get no year-end bonus at all.
lead_paragraph: A week after Goldman Sachs moved to quell the outcry over its resurgent profits and pay, Morgan Stanley said its top executive would forgo his bonus this year.

headline.main: Unlike Most on Wall St., Morgan Stanley’s Chief Will Forgo His 2009 Bonus
headline.print_headline: Unlike Most on Wall St., Morgan Stanley’s Chief Will Forgo His 2009 Bonus
